name: Star Force II: Revenge Wars
overview: A vertically scrolling space shooter created in SEUCK by Miha Rinne of CIA that supports cooperative play. In our compilation of space games we could not miss a classic vertical scrolling shoot em'up, so we decided to include Blood Revenge\Revenge Wars, a playable and fun romp requiring reflexes and few tactics. Shoot, shoot, shoot for kilometers of screen and the graphics are well taken care of. Now relax and have fun! Published as Blood Revenge in Italy in Play on tape Nuova serie - Guerre Spaziali 4.
